name: My Pal, Bumblo
description:
A kid and a bee go around collecting magic crystals. What could possibly BEE wrong?

(This game was made in 7 days for Brackeys Jam 2022.1.)

*For the best audio-visual experience, we recommend you download and play the Windows version

Controls (Keyboard only):

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move/Jump
  • Enter/X (Hold) - Sprint
  • Backspace - Give Up/Return to previous screen
